answers.answer: Mines done that too and my armpits and belly button. Just hormones it'll go away after delivery
My doctor says that's a sign of diabetes. Of course I'm not sure, but have you done your gd test yet?
My face has this like mask over it.. It looks darker than normal and I just assumed it was from the pregnancy since I remember it happening to me during my first pregnancy
its normal some women skin gets darker some doesn't my neck got a lil darker when i was pregnant n i didn't have diabetes its just a normal part of pregnancy
My chest has a lot of dark spots I hate it
I'm 38 weeks & 5 days pregnant. I do NOT have diabetes, lol. All I noticed was that it was a bit darker.. I guess it's hormones?
Same here i thought i was the only one!!My neck,armpits,belly button & face all have dark spots! I hate it :/

Its pretty normal. I'm also light skin so having dark skin on the neck and armpits is just not pretty! My family says its one of the signs if you're having a boy. Some women have asked me if I was having a boy because they can tell from the dark skin.. And yes, I'm having a boy!
I thought it was only me, my amrpits & my neck has been dark. I thought i was dirty lol
Yeah you can read online about it. Its really normal:)
Yes I'm having a boy too! Don't really believe in all those myths but so far some of the myths have been true for me

question: I'm a very light skin complexted women and I've barely noticed that my neck almost looks I don't scrub enough... I've never had this problem before I got pregnant. My neck isn't super dark but it looks darker than the rest of the skin of my neck and face. Is this normal?
title: Dark neck anyone?
